SKT_FIRST.name: Get Your Cameras Ready!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks the enemy. When the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, activates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack. When it is the caster's turn, gains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Showmanship (Unique Resource)</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 連携が確定で発生\nダメージUP

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nIncreases Charisma duration of all allies and enemies except for Bryn by 1 turn
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n브린 제외 아군과 적 모두 카리스마 +1턴
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\nブリンを除く味方・敵全体に\nカリスマ+1ターン

description: Attacks the enemy. When the caster has a <color=#28d9ed>barrier</color>, activates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack. When it is the caster's turn, gains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000076_1_2]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Showmanship (Unique Resource)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 자신이 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 보유한 상태라면 가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>협공</color>을 발생시킵니다. 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유자원 : 아이돌력</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。自分が<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>状態の場合、最も攻撃力が高い味方に<color=#28d9ed>連携</color>を発生させる。自分のターンの場合、<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:アイドル力】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>獲得する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Lovely Choreography
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, grants <color=#28d9ed>Charisma</color> to all allies and enemies except for Bryn for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n(Active Effect) Grants <color=#28d9ed>Charisma</color> to all allies except for Bryn for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Then, grants all allies a barrier proportional to the caster's Attack for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) At the start of battle, grants <color=#28d9ed>Charisma</color> to all allies and enemies except for Bryn for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000076_2_3] turn(s)</color>.\n\n(Active Effect) Grants <color=#28d9ed>Charisma</color> to all allies except for Bryn for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000076_2_3] turn(s)</color>. Then, grants all allies a barrier proportional to the caster's Attack for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000076_2_5] turn(s)</color>.

5_jp: 敵全体にカリスマ付与

SKT_SECOND.name_jp: ラブリーパフォーマンス
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 전투 입장 시 브린을 제외한 아군과 적 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>카리스마</color>를 부여합니다.\n\n(액티브 효과) 브린을 제외한 제외한 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>카리스마</color>를 부여합니다. 그 이후 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 자신의 공격력에 비례하여 실드를 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)戦闘開始時、ブリンを除く味方全体と敵全体に<color=#28d9ed>カリスマ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n(アクティブ効果)ブリンを除く味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>カリスマ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。その後、味方全体に自分の攻撃力に応じたシールドを<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Dreams Come True
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: <color=#28d9ed>Requires 5 Showmanship (Unique Resource) to use this skill.</color>\nIgnores Resilience of all enemies and removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> buff(s), then attacks all enemies. This skill ignores the target's Defense by <color=#28d9ed>30%</COLOR>, and does not miss.
description: <color=#28d9ed>Requires [Buff_V_2000076_3_2] Showmanship (Unique Resource) to use this skill.</color>\nIgnores Resilience of all enemies and removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000076_3_3]</color> buff(s), then attacks all enemies. This skill ignores the target's Defense by <color=#28d9ed>30%</COLOR>, and does not miss.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 아이돌력 5개 보유 시 사용 가능합니다.</color>\n적 전체의 효과 저항을 무시하고 강화 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제한 뒤 적 전체를 공격합니다. 이 스킬은 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>무시하며, 빗나감이 발생하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:アイドル力】が5個ある場合、使用できる。</color>\n敵全体の効果抵抗を無視し、強化効果を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除した後、敵全体にダメージを与える。このスキルは対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</COLOR>無視し、ミスヒットが発生しない。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all characters participating in the Skill Chain by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, grants the caster a barrier proportional to the caster's Attack for 1 turn.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Starter Effect</color>: Increases <color=#28d9ed>Penetration</color> of all characters participating in the Skill Chain by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, grants the caster a barrier proportional to the caster's Attack for 1 turn.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 스타터 효과</color> : 해당 스킬 체인 참가자의 <color=#28d9ed>관통력</color>이 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신에게 1턴 동안 자신의 공격력에 비례하여 실드를 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(初手)</color>:このチェーンスキル参加者の<color=#28d9ed>貫通力</color>が<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分にシールドを1ターンの間付与する。自分の攻撃力が高いほど効果がUPする。
